title: AI Loan Validation
description: Analyze the logs from three AI subsystems regarding a loan application. Only ONE statement is false. Please select the wrong statement.

statements.text: The applicant has a high debt-to-income ratio.
The Risk Assessment AI is correct.

solution.explanation: If Statement 1 is false, Statement 3 is also false. If Statement 3 is false, Statement 1 is also false. Therefore, only Statement 2 can be false without creating a double contradiction.
solution.hint: Analyze the relationship between Statement 1 and Statement 3. If one is false, does it force the other to be false as well?
